lines.content: # I would like to join this list. How can I help the project
For more information, please refer to our [contributor's guide](https://oss-generic.github.io/process/).
* kkbot.kkbot is a chatbot that helps keep track of your to-do list!
* Class representing the exit command for KKBot when user inputs 'bye'
* Returns KKBot's closer message when user inputs "bye"
* @param tasks the list of tasks stored by KKBot
* @param ui the ui object that governs what response is returned to the user
* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the closer message when KKBot is terminated
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Command class to encapsulate user inputs.
* Method to execute an action after receiving a user input.
* @param tasks the list of tasks stored by KKBot
* @param ui the ui object that governs what response is returned to the user
* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return kkbot.kkbot's response to the user input
* @throws InvalidTaskException if user input is wrong
* @throws StorageException if there is an error reading from/writing to hard drive
public abstract String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage)
* Class representing the command for KKBot when user inputs a deadline task
* @param description the description of the deadline task
* @param date the deadline date of the task
* Returns a set of actions done by KKBot when user inputs "deadline".
* @param tasks the list of tasks stored by KKBot
* @param ui the ui object that governs what response is returned to the user
* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the related messages after a deadline task is added to KKBot
* @throws StorageException if there is an error reading from/writing to hard drive
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws StorageException {

* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the message shown when a task is deleted
* @throws InvalidTaskException when the user input is wrong
* @throws StorageException if there is an error reading from/writing to hard drive
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage)
* Class representing the command for KKBot when user inputs an event task

public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws StorageException {
* Class representing the command when user inputs find command.

* Returns a command for KKBot when user inputs "find".

* Class representing the command when user inputs list command.
* Returns a command for KKBot when user inputs "list".

* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the message with the list of all tasks in KKBot
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Class representing the command when user inputs mark command.
private int index; // index number of the task in taskList
* @param inputNumber the number input by user for

* Returns a command for KKBot when user inputs "mark".

* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the message shown when a task is marked as complete

* @throws StorageException if there is an error reading from/writing to hard drive
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage)
* Class representing the command for KKBot when user inputs a todo task

* Returns a set of actions done by KKBot when user inputs "todo".
* @param tasks the list of tasks stored by KKBot
* @param ui the ui object that governs what response is returned to the user
* @param storage the storage object to save tasks to hard drive
* @return the related messages after a todo task is added to KKBot
* @throws StorageException if there is an error reading from/writing to hard drive
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws StorageException {
* Class representing the command when user inputs unmark command.
private int index; // index number of the task in taskList

* Returns a command for KKBot when user inputs "unmark".

public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage)
* KKBotException class to encompass exceptions thrown by kkbot.kkbot.

private static Command parseForDate(String[] splitInput, String type)

throw new InvalidArgumentException("You missed out a task number, please input one!");
throw new InvalidArgumentException("You missed out a task description, please input one!");
throw new InvalidArgumentException("You missed out a task description and date, please input one!");
throw new InvalidArgumentException("You missed out a date, please input one!");
throw new InvalidArgumentException("You missed out a command, please input one!");

throw new InvalidArgumentException("Woops! The task number isn't valid! Please correct it!");
